title: Radiant Diamond Nakshi Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: Emerald. Handcrafted in Hyderabad with a signature Hyderabadi polish.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate Nakshi work detailing, giving it a vintage yet elegant appeal. The central pendant features a radiating floral design, embedded with sparkling diamonds and accented by a vibrant Ruby and Emerald. Pearl drops add a touch of traditional grace. The matching Jhumkas echo the Haaram's design with a delicate bell shape and a single dangling pearl.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings
and other festive celebrations. Its timeless design also makes it suitable for upscale modern events and cocktail parties.
description: This Haaram set is a true heirloom piece, combining the brilliance of diamonds with the traditional artistry of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. The versatile design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary elegance, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
